Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: honeyb1844
Reviews.Content: If you are looking for a great camera you can use every day, but want high quality photos, this is it, look no further!

Reviews.Title: FujiFilm is My Favorite Camera!!!!
Reviews.Author: ToshaLina "Inspired"
Reviews.Content: I love this camera!!! Clean crisp pictures come out of this baby!  It has many different settings and I like to use them all.  I am a big fan of FujiFilm SLR style digital cameras. I always have it somewhere with me.  I am an aspiring freelance photographer and am in my beginning stages so this is definitely a great camera for beginners.  If you are looking for a decently priced camera, this is a great choice. You won't be disappointed!

Reviews.Title: nice camera for beginners
Reviews.Author: liljamie
Reviews.Content: Great camera for beginners. Definitely some learning curve and some functions of a slr camera. Only drawback is the aa batteries.

Reviews.Title: Was sent the wrong camera
Reviews.Author: Mare
Reviews.Content: I was sent the S4300 camera instead of the S3400.  Because they said they were out of the S3400 even though it showed being in stock.  The S4300 only had 26x zoom and a couple other things I didn't really like.  So, I had to send it back.  Then I had to find and order another camera.  I'm sure I would have really liked this camera, if it would have been sent to me(& not out of stock).

Reviews.Title: Verry good litter camer
Reviews.Author: Ernest
Reviews.Content: This a good camer I got my monday love it I will be get fuji sh20 to day  I know it a good one to

ProductInfo.Features:
14.0 million pixels
1/2.3-inch CCD with primary color filter
Fujinon 28x optical zoom lens
ProductInfo.Name: FUJIFILM FinePix S3400 Black 14 MP 3.0" LCD 28X Optical Zoom 24mm Wide Angle Digital Camera
